headline: WPP Shares Tumble on Expectations of More Top-Line Pressure
summary: The advertising group posted a steeper-than-expected drop in its top-line figure for the fourth quarter, hit by headwinds in China and North America, and forecast little improvement this year.

raw.headline: WPP Shares Tumble on Expectations of More Top-Line Pressure
raw.summary: The advertising group posted a steeper-than-expected drop in its top-line figure for the fourth quarter, hit by headwinds in China and North America, and forecast little improvement this year.
